Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1984...
Traded from Lynchburg to New Jersey on 2/28/1984 (Going to NJ: P R. Quinney. Going to LYN: P D. Quirk)...
Injured on 8/19/1986 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/13/1986, off Justin Bostic (NE)...
Earned first career win on 6/12/1987...
Injured on 7/24/1987 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Traded from New Jersey to Pontiac on 6/23/1990 (Going to NJ: SS C. Prange. Going to PON: P R. Quinney, P T. Omara, P J. Bryant)...
